title.rendered: Digital Marketing Weekly Wrap – in case you have missed the latest marketing updates & news

content.rendered:
Hello Readers! “Weekend is the beginning of the new chapter for another week ahead.” – Anonymous   We completely understand in such a busy world, it’s not easy to keep a tab on latest marketing news and updates daily. Therefore it’s our obligation to make it easy for our readers by providing the easiest way to keep them updated. In the same context, here we have listed all the latest marketing news and updates in a single – Digital Marketing Wrap (from 1st to 9th June), just for you. Have a look!

1. Digital Marketing Events

Intercontinental Marketing Conferences, Summits & Events: June-July Roaster

Marketing is evolving day by day and attending a conference or an event is a brilliant way to stay ahead in the ever-changing industry. Therefore, we have shared a list of marketing conferences, summits, and other events to help you out to know about the marketing trends during June- July. Read more

2. Email Marketing Statistics

31 Astonishing Email Marketing Statistics You Need To Know

Emails play a big role in describing and building a business brand identity. It is one of the factors that cater business success. In the current scenario, it is one of the essential tools of digital marketing for businesses that help to build a relationship between the customer and company. In the post, we have shared the list of email marketing stats & facts that will certainly help you to shape your marketing strategy. Read more

3. Digital Marketing News

Quora Has Launched Native Image Ads For Better Advertising Experience

Quora is a famous question-and-answer platform where questions and answers asked, answered, edited, and organized by its community of users. Recently, it has launched an option for advertisers to create either Text Ads or Image Ads when designing their ad creative. Read more

4. Trainee Testimonials

Digiperform Helped Me To Get My Dream Job With The Famous Clothing Brand Numero Uno – Garima Khatwani

Meet Digiperformer Garima Khatwani, currently working as a Digital Marketing Manager in one of the well-renowned fashion apparel brand – Numero Uno Clothing Ltd. In the chit-chat session, she shared why she decided to learn digital marketing and how dCDMC training at Digiperform helped her to be the part of an acclaimed brand. Read more

Digiperform Offers Plenty Of Career Options & Prepares You For The Work World – Ayushi Saraogi

Meet Digiperformer Ayushi Saraogi, a BBA graduate, and YouTuber sharing why she decided to learn digital marketing to enhance her YouTube marketing skills. Read more

5. Digiperform in Media

What is common between successful companies? What stimulates these companies to make small steps to the goal? Once the goal is achieved, do they continue in the same direction or start something completely different? Achieving success in life is not something one gets by fluke or luck but is something for which a combination of skills, timing & hard work with a tint of expert advice, is required. Here, we have shared how Digiperform is setting a benchmark for itself and sparkling like a star in Media.

SMEs Must Invest To Upgrade Their Digital Platform For Next Level – Manu Jolly

The prominent SME focussed business magazine- SME World – has featured Manu Jolly, Co-Founder of Digiperform in the corporate story highlighting Digiperform’s business model, expansion plans, clientele and traction Digital Marketing is receiving in India, in its May print and online issue by the Editor – Rajen Kumar. Read more

Why Actions Speak Louder Than Degrees – Vaibhav Vats

The prominent financial publication – Financial Express – has featured the authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-Founder of Digiperform, in its weekly education supplement-Education, today in both print and online edition. The publication has carried the article- Skills over degrees, the new success mantra for millennials under the headline  ‘Why actions speak louder than degrees‘ stating the importance of Skills to choose the path of success. Read more We hope this makes your day more positive and productive. Stay Tuned!
